QuestData.Title: Squid Out of Water
QuestData.Description: Toryl told me about those squid creatures that are controlling my brothers.$B$BI have never seen anything like them before around Jandvik. The naga must have brought them from wherever they came.$B$BI do not want any more of my kin to suffer the fate of being controlled by the naga.$B$BFind out where those squids come from and stop them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 5 Willbreaker Incubators in the Sashj'tar Ruins.
QuestData.CompletionText: I cannot think of a worse fate than to be controlled by another.
QuestData.RewardText: The naga will not be taking any more of my kin!
